title: Is it possible to Change the login theme

replies.body:
There is sadly no official way to chose your favorite log in theme as of right now. However if you are feeling especially brave you can try following this Reddit post [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/2d4wd7/you_asked_i_deliver_use_any_video_as_your_lol/).

Remember it's not official, so **Riot** isn't responsible for anything that might happen.
